712760.name: Duped
712760.description:
A cold, dark cave stands between you and your journey to find yourself. In this treacherous world, your clones will have to be sacrificed to get out. Difficult decisions will be made.

Duped explores themes of loneliness, isolation, and identity, through a 2D action/puzzle platformer. Control a square on its journey to escape the cave it has found itself in. Create clones, control them, and crawl over their bodies to overcome obstacles.

Features:

  • Over 40 levels
  • Physics-based puzzles
  • Minimalist story

After all, they were just disposable parts, weren’t they?
